name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
title: Verdant Winds: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
desc: "None could ever bestow a crown upon the queen of hunters, for only earth and heaven were higher than she."
in_play_description: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Anemo Die. (Once per Round)

skills.desc:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Anemo Die. (Once per Round)
